idea:
The brainchild of Dr Narendra Vankar and Dr Bhavya Vankar, this organization was founded with the vision of ‘stream-lining health services for corporate bodies as well as individuals, all under one roof.’ And this was achieved by strategically partnering with more than 100 top Healthcare Service Providers in India (all ISO, NABL certified) and around-the-clock endeavour to provide service quality of the highest standards.

Quantum CorpHealth – A place where wellness is at the core of every service provided and convenience is at the core of every offer. As everything you would possibly need for your healthcare is right here. All in one place. At Quantum CorpHealth, we believe that preventing health problems is the best way to stay healthy and active, so we provide bespoke preventive healthcare through a wide range of health check-up packages and patient care initiatives.
name: Quantum CorpHealth Pvt Ltd.

idea:
We are working in Telecom passive products / Telecom Accessories fields and are manufacturing and designing the components as per client requirements. We have Partnered with some of manufacturing facilities in India. 

We are in supplies of Telecommunication Products like Patch Panels, Joint closures, FDMS, ADSS Accessories, Patch Cords, Fiber Optic Attenuator, PLC Splitters, FDF, ODF, Aerial Joint Boxes, MDF, Tools Kits (Customized), ADSS Installation hardware fixtures , ADSS Tension assembly set , ADSS Suspension assembly set , ADSS/ FTTH Pole & Cable Installation Accessories, HTB, OTB, FDC Cabinets, FAT, FDC Etc.


We are also providing Business consultancy to various clients like Sterlite Technologies, Fiberfox INC, Itronics, HFCL.  For these Companies, we are Providing the access of customers in Telecommunications  like Ericsson, Nokia, Airtel, Reliance Jio, Accenture and many more. This helps in adding value to our organization and also visibility across premium segment companies. Also we are developing new products for these partners.
name: FIBTEK COMMUNICATIONS PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
Making locally made alcoholic drinks accessible to entire India by taking them online. We will start with these 8 famous drinks -

1. Palm Toddy from Andhra Pradesh and Tamil Nadu

2. Chhaang from Sikkim

3. Lugdi from Himachal Pradesh

4. Urak from Goa

5. Feni from Goa

6. Chuak from Tripura

7. Apo from Arunachal Pradesh and Assam

8. Mahua from Jharkhand, West Bengal and Odisha
name: Originaire Delight

idea: We are an e-commerce aggregator marketplace for Grocery, Daily Needs and related products. We aspire to promote online grocery shopping to be part of the journey to take it to the next level and at the same time achieve it with inclusive growth.
name: Alankit Ventures

idea: Manufacturing of fasteners with innovation in the conventional machinery so as to generate more and more employment as the company grows. Latest  computer operated machineries are obviously more profitable but the same technologies kick out people off their jobs. Our idea is to balance between both, latest technology along with employment opportunities.
name: Krypton fasteners

idea: VNK SOLUTIONS IS A STARTUP FIRM BASED IN MUMBAI MAHARASHTRA INDIA.
name: VNK SOLUTIONS

idea:
VANS Skilling and Advisory partners with organizations in their transformation journey and in creating a sustainable stakeholder value.
With its indigenously developed products, innovative and tech-enabled methodologies, and focus on execution, VANS Skilling is uniquely poised to deliver business results and shareholder value across sectors.

- Indigenously built, customizable plug and play products and methodologies in form of its niche vertical 10X.

- Research and Knowledge lab that focuses on customer insights, sectorial trends, primary and secondary research and acts as a back-end.

- Structured and robust Program Management Office (PMO) process that facilitates execution excellence, leadership, and transformation capability and provides a tight linkage to the business outcome from it's Meraki and Functional Academy verticals.

- Enhancing Industry-Academia partnership through its unique offering YUGMA

Website  YUGMA
name: SMS VANS SKILLING AND ADVISORY PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: Digital Twins for energy storage and management based on simulated data to benchmark systems
name: Confidential
